text: Dalila Spiteri (born 24 April 1997) is an Italian tennis player. Spiteri has a career high WTA singles ranking of 456 achieved on 22 October 2018. She also has a career high WTA doubles ranking of 470 achieved on 15 October 2018. Spiteri made her WTA main draw debut at the 2019 Internazionali Femminili di Palermo in the doubles draw partnering Federica Bilardo. Start 2020 by winning three ITF W15 tournaments (1 single and 2 double) in February url=https://www.tennisexplorer.com/player/spiteri/?annual=2020 ==ITF Circuit finals== ===Singles: 2 (2 titles)=== {|
